# init(subBlockCapacity:)

**Initializer**

Create empty block buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(subBlockCapacity: Int = 0)
```

## Parameters

- **subBlockCapacity**: Minimum number of sub blocks in this block buffer.
title: init(subBlockCapacity:)
